remarks: Two ways of expressing existential uniqueness via an indirect equality. (Contributed by NM, 23-Dec-2012.)
statement:
reusv3.1 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
reusv3.2 $e |- ( y = z -> C = D ) $.
reusv3i $p |- ( E. x e. A A. y e. B ( ph -> x = C ) -> A. y e. B A. z e. B ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> C = D ) ) $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x z $.
$d D x y $.
$d ph x z $.
$d ps x y $.
